item.title: New MultiForM website
item.description: Welcome to our brand new website, created with the great Hugo, hosted on GitHub. Here are relevant links if you want to know how this website works: - GitHub pages - Hugo - GoHugo Ananke theme - Namecheap

item.title: First Nottingham OpenFOAM(R) workshop
item.description: July 22-23 2019 at the University of Nottingham. Registration is open!
